alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 8:57PM MDT until April 12 at 4:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of one to three inches, highest on benches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Salt Lake Valley and Utah Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
